name: Magical you (Version0.5)
description:
This is my 2nd Webnovel not so demo-ish (Since it's complete-story wise STORY WISE X3, so no more chapters or...maybe? hehehe), It's a well It's what we call a "Yuri" Story, or is it?

WARNINGS: NOVEL HAS NO MUSIC, ALSO CHARACTER SIZING MAY BE GLITCHY AND WILL BE FIXED!, STORY WISE IT'S COMPLETE BUT IT'S GOING TO GET UPDATED MUSIC AND SOUND WISE! DON'T WORRY I WILL REPEAT IT MORE THAN ONCE

THE SAVE AND LOAD BUTTONS WORK AS QUICK SAVE AND QUICK LOAD, REFER TO "2 HEARTS" FOR MORE INFO

IT DOESN'T HAVE VOICE ACTING-YET! BUT IT WILL HAVE! I JUST WANTED TO GET THE NOVEL OUT SO!...BUT STILL! IT HAS SOME WONDERFUL CG DRAWN BY THE TALENTED ELIZABETH NATI!
(THIS DESCRIPTION WILL BE UPDATED AND SO WILL CREDITS OK?)

ALSO THE COVER IS TEMPORARY X3 SPOILER ALLRT I GUESS?
